name: SousVideSupremeCooking
0:
”Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, switch on 'Sam'”
”Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking to get the recipe for 'Chicken Curry'”
”Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, what is the status of my cooker”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: supreme cooking
Developer Terms of Use
des:
SousVide Supreme Cooking skill enables end-user to control the SousVide Supreme slow cooker and cook specific recipes from SousVide Supreme App.

The following utterances can be used to use this skill -

Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking to get the recipe for 'Chicken Curry'

Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, switch on 'Sam'
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, switch off 'Sam'
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, set my cooker to 100 degrees fahrenheit
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, set my cooker to cook for 2 hours 10 minutes
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, set my cooker to 100 degrees fahrenheit for 2 hours and 10 minutes
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, set my cooker to start at 5:30 pm
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, set my cooker to 100 degrees fahrenheit for 2 hours and 10 minutes starting now
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, set my cooker to 100 degrees fahrenheit for 2 hours and 10 minutes starting later
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, set my cooker to 100 degrees fahrenheit for 2 hours and 10 minutes starting 5:30pm
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, stop cooking on 'Sam'
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, list my cookers
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, what is the status of my cooker
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, what temperature is my cooker 'Sam' on
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking, get the temperature on 'Sam'

For a menu based interaction, just say -
Alexa, ask Supreme Cooking
